abilities.name: Ice Wall
abilities.description: Frost creates a wall of ice that blocks paths for a few seconds and slows down any enemy passing through it.

abilities.name: Cold Immunity
abilities.description: Frost is immune to slowing effects from ice-based enemies, maintaining full speed regardless of their attacks.

abilities.name: Elemental Manipulation
abilities.description: Gojo's ability evolves with upgrades: from small red repelling bullets to blue attracting orbs, then to powerful red and blue projectiles with devastating effects, culminating in a destructive purple sphere. Each upgrade offers unique offensive and defensive capabilities.

upgrades.name: Elemental Mastery
upgrades.description: Gojo's ability evolves with upgrades: from small red repelling bullets to blue attracting orbs, then to powerful red and blue projectiles with devastating effects, culminating in a destructive purple sphere. Each upgrade offers unique offensive and defensive capabilities.

heroType.name: Sun Celestial
heroType.description: A powerful female hero, important to the lore and medium-hard to obtain.

abilities.name: Sun Rays
abilities.description: Sun Celestial emits intense heat, burning nearby enemies alive. Enemies close to the hero are slowed by 55%, while those further away are slowed by 25%.

abilities.name: The Core of the Sun
abilities.description: When Sun Celestial touches an enemy, it burns them and becomes temporarily passable for 5 seconds. A small fire trail is left behind, slowing enemies by 90% when they touch it.

heroType.name: Scout
heroType.description: A starter hero with agile abilities, perfect for quick maneuvers and stealth tactics.

abilities.name: Flash Dash
abilities.description: The Scout dashes forward a short distance, evading enemies and obstacles.

abilities.name: Stealth Cloak
abilities.description: Temporarily makes the Scout invisible, allowing them to pass through enemies without being detected.

abilities.name: Magnetize
abilities.description: Magno creates a magnetic field around the player, attracting nearby projectiles and enemies. This ability can be used both defensively to protect allies and offensively to group enemies together.
